com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment

Class BrandIndexFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment.BrandIndexFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener, GetLocation.LocationCallback

    public class BrandIndexFragment
extends Fragment
implements android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener, android.view.View.OnClickListener, GetLocation.LocationCallback
    Fragment displaying the list of active programs. This fragment does not have any argument.
    Author:
    Nicolas Lagier

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BrandIndexFragment.Callback
      Callback interface to be implemented by parent activities, which want to be notified about a program being selected by the user
